name: photosynthesis_basic
input: Photosynthesis converts light energy into glucose. Plants use chlorophyll in the chloroplasts.

name: derivative_definition
input: A derivative measures instantaneous rate of change with respect to one variable.

name: cell_theory
input: Cell theory states that all living things are made up of cells, which are the basic units of life.

name: tangent_ratio
input: The tangent of an angle in a right triangle is opposite divided by adjacent.
